text: Danny Riesterer (5 May 1939 â€“ 22 July 2021) was a Belgian actor. He is known for his roles in Recht op Recht, Familie and 16+ He was married to Stefaan Fernande. Riesterer died on 22 July 2021, aged 82. == References == Category:1939 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Belgian actors
title: Danny Riesterer
